spell_schools.name: Air
spell_schools.description: Harness wind and weather to enhance mobility and deliver swift attacks.

spell_schools.name: Arcane
spell_schools.description: Master raw magical energy for utility spells and arcane manipulation.

spell_schools.name: Blood
spell_schools.description: Exchange life force for devastating power through blood magic rituals.

spell_schools.name: Chaos
spell_schools.description: Wield chaotic energies that produce random and devastating effects.

spell_schools.name: Dark
spell_schools.description: Channel shadow magic to curse enemies and inflict damage over time.

spell_schools.name: Earth
spell_schools.description: Command stone and earth for defensive barriers and stability.

spell_schools.name: Fire
spell_schools.description: Unleash devastating flames to incinerate enemies and break obstacles.

spell_schools.name: Ice
spell_schools.description: Freeze enemies solid and control the battlefield with ice magic.

spell_schools.name: Light
spell_schools.description: Channel holy radiance for healing, protection, and smiting evil.

spell_schools.name: Nature
spell_schools.description: Draw upon natural forces for growth, healing, and life magic.

spell_schools.name: Thunder
spell_schools.description: Strike with devastating lightning for explosive burst damage.

spell_schools.name: Void
spell_schools.description: Tap into the void between dimensions for reality-bending effects.

spell_schools.name: Water
spell_schools.description: Control water for healing, purification, and aquatic mastery.

ritual_categories.name: Ascension
ritual_categories.description: Ascend beyond mortal limits to achieve divine power temporarily.

ritual_categories.name: Circle
ritual_categories.description: Create protective circles that contain and amplify magical energies.

ritual_categories.name: Cosmic
ritual_categories.description: Align with cosmic forces to channel star and celestial magic.

ritual_categories.name: Elemental
ritual_categories.description: Converge multiple elemental forces into a unified powerful effect.

ritual_categories.name: Fountain
ritual_categories.description: Generate continuous streams of magical energy or resources.

ritual_categories.name: Planar
ritual_categories.description: Manipulate the fabric between planes and dimensions.

ritual_categories.name: Reality
ritual_categories.description: Anchor or alter the fundamental laws of reality itself.

ritual_categories.name: Resurrection
ritual_categories.description: Restore life to the fallen through powerful necromantic rituals.

ritual_categories.name: Sacrifice
ritual_categories.description: Offer blood or life force to gain immense temporary power.

ritual_categories.name: Summoning
ritual_categories.description: Call forth powerful entities from other planes to aid you.

ritual_categories.name: Temporal
ritual_categories.description: Bend time itself to freeze, accelerate, or reverse temporal flow.

ritual_categories.name: Transformation
ritual_categories.description: Transform yourself or others into different forms and shapes.

ritual_categories.name: Vortex
ritual_categories.description: Create swirling vortexes of magical energy that pull and damage.

gemstones.name: Amethyst Shard
gemstones.description: Crystalline shards harvested from amethyst geodes. Resonates with arcane frequencies and amplifies spell power. Essential component for crafting enchantment tables and mystical focus items.

gemstones.name: Apatite
gemstones.description: Brilliant cyan gemstone that channels water magic and enhances aquatic abilities. Used to craft water-breathing charms, frost spells, and ocean-navigation artifacts.

gemstones.name: Aquamarine
gemstones.description: Crystalline beryl infused with oceanic essence. Grants clarity of mind and amplifies divination magic. Ideal for crafting scrying orbs and underwater exploration gear.

gemstones.name: Carnelian
gemstones.description: Fiery orange stone that boosts courage and physical strength. Used in warrior enchantments, stamina potions, and fire resistance charms. Channels combat magic effectively.

gemstones.name: Citrine
gemstones.description: Radiant yellow quartz known as the merchant's gem. Increases fortune enchantment potency and attracts valuable loot. Essential for wealth charms and trading magic.

gemstones.name: Diamond
gemstones.description: The most durable gemstone in the realm. Grants unbreakable enchantments, maximum tool efficiency, and superior armor protection. Foundation of high-tier magical equipment and artifacts.

gemstones.name: Emerald
gemstones.description: Prized green gemstone valued by villagers and mages alike. Channels nature magic, enhances crop growth spells, and powers trading enchantments. Core component in fortune artifacts.

gemstones.name: Hematite
gemstones.description: Dense iron-rich mineral that anchors magical energy. Provides protection against hostile magic and curse resistance. Used in defensive wards and grounding rituals.

gemstones.name: Jade
gemstones.description: Sacred green stone that harmonizes natural energies. Enhances regeneration effects, boosts healing magic, and creates peaceful auras. Popular in druidic enchantments.

gemstones.name: Lapis Lazuli
gemstones.description: Sacred blue stone flecked with golden pyrite. The fundamental catalyst for all enchantment processes. Fuels enchanting tables and amplifies magical inscription power.

gemstones.name: Moonstone
gemstones.description: Ethereal gem that glows under moonlight. Amplifies night magic, enchants vision spells, and powers teleportation rituals. Strongest during full moon phases.

gemstones.name: Nether Quartz
gemstones.description: Pale crystalline mineral harvested from the Nether wastes. Powers redstone mechanisms, channels nether magic, and crafts daylight sensors. Essential for comparative enchantments.

gemstones.name: Peridot
gemstones.description: Volcanic green crystal formed in extreme heat. Channels earth magic and explosive spells. Used in blast protection enchantments and geomancy rituals.

gemstones.name: Prismarine Shard
gemstones.description: Mystical fragments from ocean monuments and guardian creatures. Channels deep sea magic, grants underwater vision, and powers conduit structures. Essential for aquatic dominion.

gemstones.name: Rhodonite
gemstones.description: Compassionate pink stone with dark veins. Amplifies healing magic, removes status effects, and mends armor. Essential for restoration spells and regeneration potions.

gemstones.name: Ruby
gemstones.description: Legendary red gemstone radiating intense power. Dramatically amplifies fire magic, grants flame resistance, and powers devastating combat spells. Highly sought by pyromancers.

gemstones.name: Sapphire
gemstones.description: Royal blue gemstone of exceptional hardness. Channels frost magic, creates ice constructs, and enhances cold-based enchantments. Rivaling ruby in magical potency.

gemstones.name: Sodalite
gemstones.description: Deep blue stone that clarifies thought and amplifies intelligence. Boosts experience gain, enhances learning speed, and powers mind-affecting enchantments.

gemstones.name: Tanzanite
gemstones.description: Extremely rare violet gemstone from distant dimensions. Channels void magic, enables dimensional travel, and transforms magical energy. Key ingredient in end-game enchantments.

gemstones.name: Topaz
gemstones.description: Golden gem that stores solar energy. Generates light sources, powers sun-based magic, and increases strength during daylight. Perfect for radiance enchantments.

gemstones.name: Tourmaline
gemstones.description: Multi-elemental crystal that harmonizes conflicting energies. Stabilizes volatile spells, balances magical effects, and creates protective shields. Versatile in complex enchantments.
